title: Gizmos and Gadgets
description:
G&#039;day guys,

I had a hard time recently trying to find a copy of The Learning Company&#039;s
&#039;Gizmos and GGadgets&#039;. I found a torrented version of the CD floating around
but It wouldn&#039;t seem to work on XP no matter what. After much research I stumbled
upon a DOS version thats about 113mb smaller than the CD version but runs exactly
the same and even with sound. I hope you enjoy this game as much as I did.
The instructions are written for XP but apparently work for Vista.

If you get stuck don&#039;t hesitate to comment a question.

This is my first ever torrent, hope you enjoy it. =D

Edit: Due to minimum size limitations on Mininova I added GTA and Commander Keen.
